long_description: The classic Woods Longhouse 6 Tent features a huge living area and towering standing height throughout the interior. It's perfect for up to 6 people on your 3-season car-camping trips. Sleeping area can be divided into 2 rooms, each with its own entry. An additional roof pole adds ceiling height and stability to the vestibule, which can convert into a cool and bug-free screen house on hot days. Large no-see-um meshed vestibule with mulitple window shades. Oversized main zippers. The Woods Longhouse 6 Tent comes with a heavy-duty carry case, full accessory bag, stakes and guylines. Closeout.
short_description: The classic Woods Longhouse 6 Tent features a huge living area and towering standing height throughout the interior. It's perfect for up to 6 people on your 3-season car-camping trips.
